mapper.update: update cp_msg set Statu=0 where ID=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from cp_msg WHERE id=#{id} and ac_id=#{AC_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT d.* ,c.Create_Time,c.MSG_CONTENT ,c.MSG_TITLE as MSG_TITLE from cp_msg d,( SELECT a.ID as Id ,b.Create_Time,b.MSG_CONTENT ,b.MSG_TITLE from cp_msg a,cp_msgcontext b where a.CONTENT_ID=b.ID and a.AC_ID=#{AC_ID}) c where d.ID=c.ID
SELECT a.*,b.Create_Time,b.MSG_CONTENT from cp_msg a,cp_msgcontext b where a.CONTENT_ID=b.ID and a.AC_ID=#{AC_ID} and a.SEND_ID=#{SEND_ID} ORDER BY b.Create_Time
select * from cp_msg c where c.id=#{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) from cp_msg c LEFT JOIN cp_msgcontext d ON c.CONTENT_ID=d.ID LEFT JOIN cp_user u on u.ID=c.AC_ID WHERE c.Statu=1 and c.AC_ID=#{id} and d.Create_Time BETWEEN u.CREATE_TIME and NOW()
